original_title: CBSL announcement on outward remittances; Certain restrictions relaxed
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Central Bank of Sri Lanka on Monday (24) announced that a new order ws issued by the Finance Minister relaxing certain limitations / suspensions imposed on outward remittances of foreign exchange.
Court prevents protest in Fort; Trade Unions continue protest despite rainfall
Newsline | Non Essential Imports must be curbed | Prof. Lalithasiri Gunaruwan | 24th July 2023
